about_the_game:
Scavenger Run is an action rogue lite game that puts you in command of an old world submarine and a crew of robotic workers, once staff to its former life as a Japanese restaurant. Journey through a player driven narrative of cause and effect game play. Defend the fleet against the swarms attacks navigating through sunken cities. Face off against mechanical giants, mastering skills and acquiring new abilities. Repair, upgrade and prepare to journey deeper on a dynamic adventure to save the last of your family.

MEET YOUR CREW

BUSBOY


Busboy once enjoyed life as a kitchen hand and dishwasher, now this agile magnetic ball is armed with an arsenal of sharp cutlery and dual grapple hooks. Tasked with ridding the exterior hull and the cramped mechanical systems of any infesting creatures to get the sub back to the fight.




TAIKO

Long before the world fell over the Taiko drone entertained the restaurant's patrons, now the Taiko drone demolishes armor and tears out machine parts with well timed hits from a swinging anchor. Broken debris can arm the subs sonic cannons and detonating the fleets' deployed depth chargers can expose valuable systems used to carry the fleet forward.



Other Key Features include:
  • Dynamic events and systems to make every journey a new experience.
  • Decorate your command area with gifts and trophies from your adventure.
  • Unlock-able game modes to test your new skills.
  • New playable characters and events planned for the games launch and after!

name: Scavenger Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Low" preset. SSD required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X / Intel Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with the "Ultra" preset. SSD required.

short_description: Scavenger Run is an action rogue lite game that puts you in command of an old world submarine and a crew of robotic workers. Hunted by a mechanical swarm, the only escape is to command your submarine, pilot its robotic crew fighting massive creatures, and prepare the sub for the journey ahead.
